```{r}
shape1 <- readRDS("data/PA_herpailurus_pos_blobs.RDs")
shape2 <- readRDS("data/PA_herpailurus_pre_blobs.RDs")
shape12<-rbind(shape1, shape2)
hist(log10(shape12$blobArea))
plot(shape12)
```
